definition: see also/please refer to/compare (cf.)/to consult for reference
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: Please refer to the Resources section for further details.
sentences.chinese: 请参看参考资料部分进一步了解细节。

sentences.english: See below for the subject list.
See Chapter 3 for a detailed explanation of pattern movement techiniques.
sentences.chinese: 请参看第3章了解模式移动的相关技术。

sentences.english: The asterisk refers to a footnote.
You will see an example next.
sentences.chinese: 请接着参看后面的示例。

sentences.english: For detailed information about the scanning software, refer to the Online.
sentences.chinese: 若要详细了解扫描软件，请参看联机帮助文档。

sentences.english: For more information, please see the drug monograph on Clonidine .
sentences.chinese: 更多信息，可参看有关可乐定的专题。

sentences.english: Research references are included that contain more in-depth treatments of subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 相关领域更深入的讨论可以参看引用资料。

sentences.english: Please refer to the right-hand column of page 200 of this dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 请参看这本词典第二百页右面一栏。

definition: to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
to refer to/see also/compare (cf.)/to pay respect to
